content: modern fun beanie hat by hooks and purls stephanie burkhart yarn caron chunky cupcakes in shade mango tango needles one set of 16 circulars in size 10 ½ or 6 5mm and one set of double pointed needles in the same size for decrease rounds at the top notions one stitch marker scissors darning needle and measuring tape gauge 13 stitches by 20 row = 4 x4 square pattern using circulars co 66 sts join for working in the round being careful not to twist and pm row 1-10 *k1 p1 repeat from * row 11 *p1 k1 repeat from * terms row 12 *k1 p1 repeat from * = inches row 13-18 repeat row 11 and 12 3x co = cast on row 19-26 knit every row sts = stitches row 27-34 repeat row 11 and 12 4x decrease row 1 * k9 k2tog repeat from * pm = place marker decrease row 2 *k8 k2tog repeat from * k = knit decrease row 3 *k7 k2tog repeat from * decrease row 4 *k6 k2tog repeat from * p = purl decrease row 5 *k5 k2tog repeat from * x = times decrease row 6 *k4 k2tog repeat from * decrease row 7 *k3 k2tog repeat from * decrease row 8 *k2 k2tog repeat from * decrease row 9 *k2tog repeat from * break yarn about 16 from work sew through remaining loops and weave in trim end weave in beginning tail of cast on yarn as well and trim done
